title: Update a reservation assignment
description: Updates an existing reservation assignment, which links a project, folder, or organization to a specific reservation in the BigQuery Reservation API.

objective.narrative: This sample solves the problem of needing to modify how a project uses its reserved slots without re-creating the assignment. For example, a developer can update an assignment to change the job type, which controls whether `QUERY`, `PIPELINE`, or other job types from the assigned project can use the reservation's slots.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_assignment_update
